attributes.action: Change the British national anthem to the LazyTown song 'We Are Number One'.
attributes.additional_details: It would also be a fitting tribute to Stefán Karl Stefánsson, the actor of Robbie Rotten, who sadly passed away last year.
attributes.background: The song describes our nation perfectly as it is, unquestionably, the world's number one country.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx
